details.item: [Edge case handling] Handles empty array or single element array
[Logical correctness] Correctly initializes variables before the main algorithm
[Logical correctness] Properly implements the main loop structure
[Logical correctness] Correctly handles conditional logic within the algorithm
[Logical correctness] Updates variables correctly during algorithm execution
[Algorithm correctness] Correctly implements the core algorithm logic
[Algorithm efficiency] Uses an efficient approach (O(n) time complexity)
